metadata.description: In this issue meet President Barack Obama, currently the standard-bearer of the Democratic Party and our President. But how did he get there? Decision 2012: Barack Obama #1 charts the course of this candidate from his early beginnings to winning the 2008 presidential election. If Obama is your candidate in 2012, then pre-order this comic book at your local comic shop and let your voice be heard. Don't forget to ask your local retailer how to get a copy of the rare 1-in-10 Superhero variant cover!
metadata.name: Decision 2012
